summary: Login page shows 500 error on mobile devices
description: Users on iOS and Android report seeing a 500 internal server error when attempting to access the login page. Issue appears to be intermittent and related to session handling.

summary: Implement dark mode for the entire application
description: Add a dark mode theme option that users can toggle. Should persist user preference and apply across all pages. Follow WCAG accessibility guidelines for contrast ratios.

summary: Database connection pool exhaustion during peak hours
description: Application becomes unresponsive between 2-4 PM EST due to database connection pool being fully utilized. Need to increase pool size or optimize connection usage.

summary: Add export to PDF functionality for reports
description: Users should be able to export dashboard reports to PDF format with company branding. Include charts, tables, and summary statistics.

summary: Memory leak in real-time notification service
description: WebSocket notification service shows gradual memory increase over time, eventually causing crashes. Appears to be related to event listener cleanup.

summary: Upgrade authentication system to support SSO
description: Implement Single Sign-On (SSO) support for enterprise customers using SAML 2.0 and OAuth 2.0 protocols. Should integrate with major identity providers.

summary: Search results returning incorrect data for special characters
description: When searching with special characters like ampersands, quotes, or Unicode characters, the search returns incorrect or no results. Issue is with query escaping.

summary: Create onboarding tutorial for new users
description: Design and implement an interactive walkthrough for first-time users. Should cover key features and can be skipped or replayed from settings.

summary: API rate limiting not working correctly
description: Rate limiting middleware is not properly throttling requests. Some users exceed limits without being blocked, while others are incorrectly rate-limited.

summary: Migrate legacy data from old system
description: Plan and execute migration of customer data from legacy MySQL database to new PostgreSQL setup. Includes data validation and rollback strategy.

summary: Payment gateway integration failing for international cards
description: Transactions from international credit cards are being rejected with error code 3D001. Issue occurs specifically with cards from EU countries.

summary: Add multi-language support for Spanish and French
description: Implement i18n framework and translate all user-facing text to Spanish and French. Include right-to-left text support for future languages.

summary: Dashboard widgets not loading on Safari browser
description: Users on Safari 16+ report that dashboard widgets show loading spinner indefinitely. Works fine on Chrome and Firefox. Likely a CORS or caching issue.

summary: Implement automated backup system for production database
description: Set up automated daily backups with point-in-time recovery capability. Store backups in geographically distributed locations with 30-day retention.

summary: File upload fails for files larger than 10MB
description: Users cannot upload files exceeding 10MB despite UI allowing selection. Server returns 413 Payload Too Large error. Need to increase limit to 50MB.

summary: Redesign user profile page with better UX
description: Current profile page is cluttered and confusing. Redesign with cleaner layout, better information hierarchy, and easier navigation to settings.

summary: Email notifications not being sent for critical alerts
description: System alerts configured as 'critical' are not triggering email notifications. SMS notifications work fine. Issue started after email service migration.

summary: Add two-factor authentication for all accounts
description: Implement 2FA using authenticator apps (TOTP) and backup codes. Make it mandatory for admin accounts and optional for regular users.

summary: Incorrect timezone display in activity logs
description: Activity logs show timestamps in UTC instead of user's local timezone. Need to convert and display based on user's browser timezone or profile setting.

summary: Performance optimization for large dataset queries
description: Queries returning more than 10,000 records take over 30 seconds to complete. Implement pagination, indexing, and query optimization to improve performance.
